procedural_fairness: Judicial review of Immigration Appeal Division’s dismissal; analyzed under reasonableness standard.
evidence_consideration: applicant signed a declaration acknowledging her daughter would not be examined
Board found this acknowledgment valid despite signing errors
family_ties: Applicant sought to sponsor her daughter
reasonableness_of_decision: Federal Court upheld the Board's decision, finding it reasonable based on evidence and applicable law
immigration_status: foreign national is not considered a family class member if they were not examined during the sponsor’s permanent residence application

exclusion_reason: not examined during sponsor’s permanent residence application
decision_outcome: daughter remains excluded from family class
family_impact: applicant sought to sponsor her daughter
